import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; // components // import TableDropdown from "components/Dropdowns/TableDropdown.js"; import roomService from './../../assets/services/roomService'; export default function RoomTable({ color }) { // state = { } const[rooms,setRooms] = useState([]); const[roomId,setRoomId] = useState(0); const loadData = ()=>{ roomService.getAll().then(res=>{ setRooms(res); }) } useEffect(()=>{ loadData(); },[roomId]); return ( <> {/* Colors */}

); } RoomTable.defaultProps = { color: "light", }; RoomTable.propTypes = { color: PropTypes.oneOf(["light", "dark"]), };
